job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: From our founding until now our mission has remained the same to make access to data as simple and reliable as electricity With Fivetran your data just arrives in your warehouse canonical and ready to query no engineering or maintenance required As we watch more and more companies leverage our technology to become truly datadriven were proud not only of our growth but also of the fact that weve grown without compromising our core valuesbrbrstrongIntegritybrbrstrongWe do the right thing even when its harder in the short run We challenge the status quo by reasoning from first principlesbrbrstrongInitiativebrbrstrongFivetran belongs to all of us We take ownership and are accountable for getting things done Through curiosity learning and coaching we grow as individuals and teamsbrbrstrongOne team one dreambrbrstrongWe share the pains and successes of our customers partners and colleagues We seek gather and trust a diverse group of teammates with different perspectives to guide Fivetrans progressbrbrIf these values resonate with you wed love to hear from youbrbrstrongAbout the rolebrbrstrongFivetran is looking for a Senior Software Engineer enthusiastic in joining a fastgrowing company Youll help build new features of our data pipeline service help improve our software architecture and maintain reliable operation of the service Were looking for people who want to learn the key values that make our product great and implement those values in the many small decisions you make every day as a developerbrbrstrongFivetran is the epitome of datadrivendevelopment  our engineering team is focused on building a world class product thatbrstrongulli Facilitates Data Analytics  join our mission is to reliably deliver bestin class schemas and clean data designed to be intuitively useful to analystslili Contributes to our Community  help develop tools like Data Lakes SQLbased Transformations and schema explorers to empower analysts to choose the best tools and to make those tools more powerfullili Is Absolutely Dependable  work to make Fivetran the most reliable and secure component of our customers data infrastructurebrliulWe emphasize using nononsense tools and take great pride in the simplicity and effectiveness of the systems we build Our backend is built on Java Postgres and Kubernetes and our frontend is built on React and TypescriptbrbrAs a Senior Software Engineer you willbrulliCreate new data source connectors to be part of a product portfolio enjoyed by customers of all sizes from startups to enterprisesliliDevelop maintain and test codeliliContribute to the efforts to the maintenance and improvement of existing connectors call for improvement in all areas of Fivetrans codebase and infrastructureliliParticipate in oncall rotation 8 AM to 8 PMliliContribute to hiring by participating in the interview processbrliulRequirementsbrulliWrites wellstructured and performant codeliliAble to define project requirementsliliProficient at designing software and infrastructureliliWorks well in a teamliliMentors junior and senior developersliliCan identify design flaws in existing systems and come up with improvementsbrliulNicetohavesbrulliJava programming experienceliliExperience in data processing ETL ELT andor cloudbased platformsliliExperience in designing and developing file event application or database connectorsliliExperienced working in a cloud environment utilizing AWS GCP Postgres Kubernetes Docker CircleCI or similar technologiesbrliulPerks and Benefitsbrulli100 paid Medical Dental Vision and Basic Life Insurance Benefits begin on your first dayliliOption of Health Savings Account HSA or Flexible Savings Account FSAliliGenerous paid time off PTO plus paid sick time holidays parental leave and volunteer days offlili401k match programliliEligible donation match programliliMonthly cell phone stipendliliWorkfromhome equipment reimbursement for your home office setupliliProfessional development and training opportunitiesliliCompany virtual happy hours and fun team building activitiesliliPet Insurance  and yes you can bring your wellbehaved fur babies to workliliCommuter benefits to help with transit and parking costsbrliulShaped by the realworld needs of data analysts Fivetran technology is the smartest fastest way to replicate your applications databases events and files into a highperformance cloud warehouse Fivetran connectors deploy in minutes require zero maintenance and automatically adjust to source changes  so your data team can stop worrying about engineering and focus on driving insights To learn more about Fivetrans culture and what its like to be part of the team click here and enjoy our videobrbrTo learn more about our candidate privacy policy you can read our statement here
